publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4350 Karen Gillon: Congratulations to Graeme Dott—That the Parliament congratulates Larkhall’s Graeme Dott, the new World Snooker Champion, on his incredible victory in the final of the World Snooker Championship in the Crucible Theatre and hopes that Graeme’s success will inspire young people throughout Larkhall and Scotland to participate in sports and, hopefully, some day become Scottish world champions themselves.

S2M-4350 Karen Gillon: Congratulations to Graeme Dott—That the Parliament congratulates Larkhall’s Graeme Dott, the new World Snooker Champion, on his incredible victory in the final of the World Snooker Championship in the Crucible Theatre and hopes that Graeme’s success will inspire young people throughout Larkhall and Scotland to participate in sports and, hopefully, some day become Scottish world champions themselves. Supported by: Patrick Harvie*
S2M-4350 Congratulations to Graeme Dott (lodged on 4 May 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Michael Matheson*, Donald Gorrie*
